# httpload

http压力测试

## Usage Examples

```
[root@pcnode1 httpload]# ./run.sh fs 172.28.40.251:8000
cmd: ./run.sh fs 172.28.40.251:8000
target: http://172.28.40.251:8000
hey tests: fs-172.28.40.251:8000
Start time: 2018-04-28_14:38:29
服务名	并发数	QPS	ok(200)	502	504
fs-v1(N=20000)	10	13691	20000		
fs-v1(N=20000)	50	13810	20000		
fs-v1(N=20000)	100	13233	20000		
fs-v1(N=20000)	200	12642	20000		
fs-v1(N=20000)	300	12673	19800		
fs-v1(N=20000)	500	12494	20000		
fs-v1(N=20000)	800	12203	20000		
fs-v1(N=20000)	1000	12786	20000		
fs-v1(N=20000)	1500	11883	19500		
fs-v1(N=20000)	2000	11721	20000		
fs-v1(N=20000)	3000	11657	18000		
fs-v1(N=1000000)	3000	12493	999000		
fs-v1(N=10000000)	3000	12559	9999000		
End time: 2018-04-28_14:53:25
[root@pcnode1 httpload]# 
```
